mil7.2.3:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘kalandakassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban”ti?
mil7.2.3:1.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, kalandako paṭisattumhi opatante naṅguṭṭhaṁ papphoṭetvā mahantaṁ katvā teneva naṅguṭṭhalaguḷena paṭisattuṁ paṭibāhati;
mil7.2.3:1.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kilesasattumhi opatante satipaṭṭhānalaguḷaṁ papphoṭetvā mahantaṁ katvā teneva satipaṭṭhānalaguḷena sabbakilesā paṭibāhitabbā.
mil7.2.3:1.4: Idaṁ, mahārāja, kalandakassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
